content:
Qatur
Qotur (Persian: قطور‎, Kurdish: Kotol, also Romanized as Qaţūr and Qoţūr; also known as Ghatoor, Kotur, Kutur, and Qutur)[2] is a township & capital of Qotur District, Qotur Rural District, Khoy County, West Azerbaijan Province, Iran. At the 2006 census, its population was 3,962, in 652 families.[3]  Qotur was promoted to city status in 2007.[4] It is adjacent to the Iran–Turkey border.
